ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ أَرَيْنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We showed him all of Our Signs, but he denied and spurned them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So We showed him all Our signs, but he denied them and refused,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed We showed Pharaoh Our Signs, all of them, but he declared them to be false and rejected them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We showed the Pharaoh all of Our miracles, but he called them lies and turned away from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We showed him all Our signs – so he denied them and did not accept.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We showed him (Fir`awn) all Our Ayat, but he denied and refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And truly We showed him Our signs, all of them, but he rejected and refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So We showed Pharaoh all Our signs, but he cried lies, and refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We verily did show him all Our tokens, but he denied them and refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We showed Pharaoh all Our signs but he rejected them and refused to believe in them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We shewed him Our signs, all of them, but he belied and refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We showed him all Our signs. But he denied [them] and refused [to believe them].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We showed Pharaoh all Our Signs, but he did reject and refuse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We showed him [Fir'aun (Pharaoh)] all Our Signs and Evidences, but he denied and refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So We showed him (Pharaoh) Our signs, all of them, but he belied and refused them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We showed him Our signs, all of them, but he denied and refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We certainly showed Pharaoh Our signs - all of them - but he denied and refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:56] And verily We showed him, that is, We made Pharaoh see, all Our signs, [all] nine, but he denied, them, and claimed that they were [the result of] sorcery, and refused, to affirm the Oneness [of God], exalted be He.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We verily did show him) i.e. Pharaoh (all Our tokens) the hand, the staff, the flood, the locusts, the lice, the frogs, blood, drought and lack of harvest, (but he denied them) i.e. the signs and said that they are not from Allah (and refused) to surrender to Allah, rejecting thus all the signs.
